So said  tukhus  on  2002-10-02 

>Am new to Java/EJB and would like to do a number of throughput tests 
>in parallel in seperate threads, to simulate simultaneous users 
>pounding away at my beans' methods.
>
>Can anyone recommend a package out there that will extend JUNIT to 
>provide this functionality?  

Rob, I don't have the answer for you, but I'd like to thank you for
posing the question this way. EVERYONE PAY ATTENTION.

"Can anyone recommend a package out there THAT WILL EXTEND JUNIT..."

Beautiful. JUnit doesn't have to do everything, folks.

J. B. Rainsberger,
